thumb.title: ごめんなさいを言えるかな - マチゲリータ／メグッポイド | SVカバー
thumb.description: ⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️This song may contain sensitive elements such as Violence⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️ HAPPY BIRTHDAY GUMI!!!!!!!!!!!! #GUMI誕生祭2025 imo this song is the best underrated gumi original.
